front.image: Image of Holloway Hall Bell Tower at Salisbury State College in Salisbury, Maryland.

stamp.stamp1: Portrait of Margaret Mitchell in red ink
stamp.stamp2: Portrait of Julia Ward Howe in red ink

message.printed: "Holloway Hall Bell Tower / Salisbury State College / Salisbury, Maryland / The center section of Holloway Hall at Sulsbury State College, including the noble bell tower at which one can scan the historical city of Salsbury in its entirity was completed in 1929. Students and townspeople alike are enriched by lyricl sounds eminting from the tower's Carillon of Bells, presented to the college by Alumni Association on November 5, 1973."
message.handwritten: "Dear Cousins! Pleasant having your company. Next time make it longer so that we can all get out and explore the peninsula together. Thanks for all the goodies. Am sure you managedd to show yourself a good time in Baltimore, cooled off a mite (degree or 2). Be well, – and Love, Dorothy - Murray"
